about.summary: API documentation generator from docstrings, for Python's Falcon framework

name: falcon-docs
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "falcon-docs" %}
{% set version = "0.4" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/piotrmaslanka/{{ name }}/archive/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 1f8e0ae72ba22cb5ddf87d0b769bfbeba6fbc8836057016705dea0039820a7a0

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed --no-cache-dir -vvv"

requirements:
  host:
    - python
    - pip
  run:
    - python
    - falcon
    - six
    - markdown2

test:
  imports:
    - falcondocs

about:
  home: https://github.com/piotrmaslanka/falcon-docs
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: "API documentation generator from docstrings, for Python's Falcon framework"
  dev_url: https://github.com/piotrmaslanka/falcon-docs

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - carlodri
